name: Doonamis
description:
Doonamis is a company located in Barcelona developing applications for mobile iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows Phone. Campaign creation and management (iAd, AdMob, etc.). Development server system, if required. Conception, design, development and publication of web pages and applications. Web applications adapted to smartphone (iPhone and Android). Development of custom applications. Extensions or modifications to existing solutions. Maintenance service.
Programming languages (.NET, Java, XML, etc.).
